law.catch_line: Maximum Vehicle Widths, Axle Weights And Minimum Speed Limits; Exception For Certain Snow Clearing Duties
law.text: Notwithstanding any provision of this chapter or any other law to the contrary, the maximum vehicle width as provided in section nineteen, the maximum axle weights as provided in section nineteen A and any minimum speed limit on any way shall not apply to any vehicle being operated on any public way in the performance of municipality, county or state contracted snow clearing duties.
